nodes.text: Terrelia was the homeworld of the Eighth Brother, a Terrelian Jango Jumper Inquisitor and former Jedi, and Cassilyda Cryar, another Terrelian Jango Jumper and criminal that lived in the Coruscant Underworld.

Terrelia was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2019 reference book Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition. It was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2010 reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars Character Encyclopedia by Jason Fry.
